import React from 'react' import {Link, useNavigate, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {useEffect} from 'react' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderAction' import Messages from '../Components/Messages' import Loader from '../Components/Loader' const OrderScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const params = useParams(); const userId = params.id; const orderDetail = useSelector((state) => state.orderDetail) const { loading, error, order } = orderDetail; if(!loading){ //calculate price const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100)/100).toFixed(2) } order.itemsPrice = addDecimals(order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0)) } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(userId)) }, []) return loading ? () : error ? ({error}) : ( <>

Order Details

Name : {order.user.name}

Email : {''} {order.user.email}

Address : {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {order.shippingAddress.country}

{order.isDelivered ? (Delivered on {order.deliveredAt}) : ( Not delivered )}

Payment Method

Method : {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? (Paid on {order.paidAt}) : ( Not delivered )}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? (Your caet is empty) : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = {item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} ) } export default OrderScreen
